hero.title: Wenchao Bai (白文超)
hero.subtitle: Ph.D. Candidate
hero.description: Welcome to my academic homepage. Here you'll find information about my research, publications, and professional activities.

sections.text: I am a Ph.D. Candidate at Southeast University, working in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering since September 2022, advised by A. Prof. Jiahui Jin.

From July 2023, I am also a research intern at Shenzhen Institute of Computing Sciences, fortunately advised by Prof. Wenfei Fan and collaborating with Dr. Shuhao Liu, Dr. Weilong Ren, and Dr. Zihuan Xu.
I am always open to collaborations and discussions about research opportunities, interdisciplinary projects, and applications of database systems and theories.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: I'm always interested in hearing about potential collaborations, research opportunities, or answering questions about my work.
